metadata.summary: Connect to HubSpot to fetch account activity logs using Private App access tokens
metadata.primary_use_case: Ingest and monitor account activity from HubSpot CRM platform

extracted_apis.description: HubSpot API endpoint for fetching account activity logs

extracted_apis.path: lc_adapter hubspot client_options.identity.installation_key=$INSTALLATION_KEY client_options.identity.oid=$OID client_options.platform=json client_options.sensor_seed_key=$SENSOR_NAME client_options.hostname=$SENSOR_NAME client_options.mappings.event_type_path=category access_token=$ACCESS_TOKEN
extracted_apis.description: Manual deployment of HubSpot adapter using access token

cross_refs.description: Similar SaaS adapter pattern with cloud-to-cloud and CLI deployment options
Comparable business SaaS adapter configuration for audit log ingestion
Similar business application adapter with API key authentication
Related SaaS adapter with similar client_options configuration pattern
